dating.remarks: [Werner Schade in: Christie's Online database; https://www.christies.com/lotfinder/paintings/lucas-cranach-the-elder-the-infant-christ-5403341-details.aspx; accessed 20 Feb 2018]

pageContext.description: The painting depicts the infant Christ on the right, holding the cross. Death and the devil lie vanquished at his feet. At the left side the infant St John kneels on the left hand side, and is clothed in fur with a lamb at his side.
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 20.5 x 16 cm 
[Christie's Online database; https://www.christies.com/lotfinder/paintings/lucas-cranach-the-elder-the-infant-christ-5403341-details.aspx; accessed 20 Feb 2018]
